name: Daniel Tang
title: Stanford University Student
summary: Hello! I'm a first year undergraduate at Stanford University with an interest in biology, bioengineering, and medicine/health. I'm particularly interested in neuroscience and plan on pursuing a career in both research and medicine. In the future, I hope to develop new knowledge from scientific research and apply that knowledge to help others in the clinical setting.
